mapper.select: SELECT `code` FROM `auth_permission` WHERE `id` IN ( SELECT `permission_id` FROM `auth_role_permission` WHERE `role_id` IN (SELECT `role_id` FROM `auth_user_role` WHERE `user_id` = #{userId}))
SELECT IFNULL( MAX( sort ), 0 ) AS sort FROM `auth_permission` WHERE `parent_id` = #{parentId}
